name: Twentyfourpoints
0:
”Alexa, number three number four number five and number six from twenty four points”
”Alexa, help me with number three number four number five and number six from twenty four points”
”Alexa, give me a hint for number three number four number five and number six from twenty four points”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: twenty four points
des: The 24 puzzle is an arithmetical puzzle in which the objective is to find a way to manipulate four integers so that the end result is 24. If you five Alexa 4 playing card numbers, she can tell you whether they can be solved. She can even give you a hint if you ask for it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
